Advantages of VPN

  1. Anonymous VPN without logs

    VPN uses the latest secure encryption algorithms. Logs on the servers are disabled, including the operating system logs. The servers there is no data on the use of VPN.

  2. Hiding indirect parameters

    Change consequential parameters by which possible to determine your location. For example, setting the TTL (time to live) helps determine how many hosts you are from. Connection is made to the IP address of the VPN server instead of a domain name, because the Internet Service Provider, all requests are logged.

  3. Using a VPN securely masked

    No one will know that you are using a VPN. Our technologies provide masking traffic from the ISP. Traffic on signatures is no different from visiting the HTTPS Web site. Many websites have already learned how to determine whether a VPN. Our VPN connection is not detected in the VPN Fingerprints section.
    Go to page of checking IP address.

  4. You will love Secure Kit

    Easy to use Secure Kit program automatically configures the VPN connections and protect against DNS leak.
    Secure Kit is able to mimic the normal SSL connection. Thus, you can hide the fact the use of VPN and your ISP will assume that you visit a website via https.

  5. Protection against DNS leak

    DNS query can be run on your real ISP DNS server. Any website can discover that the country of origin of your IP address and DNS server are different. It talks about using VPN.
    We protect against DNS leak leak.

Service without logs and also tells
Why we do not keep logs

VPN servers in 26+ countries

We pay much attention to the geographical location of the VPN servers. All countries have different laws in the field of information security. Due to this, we provide our customers with the highest level of security.

See more

And also Double VPN with entry points in Australia, Canada, Chile, Germany, Israel, Malaysia, Netherlands, Panama, South Africa, Switzerland, Turkey, Ukraine, United Kingdom, United States. Exit points in all represented countries.
